titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on manganese metal flake containing at least 99.5 percent by weight of manganese.
To suspend temporarily the duty on manganese metal flake containing at least 99.5 percent by weight of manganese.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on manganese metal flake containing at least 99.5% by weight of manganese.
